sentences.en: A computer in the machine creates an image on the screen.
sentences.cn: 机器上的计算机在屏幕上产生了影像。

sentences.en: Accusations of tax evasion have tarnished his clean image.
sentences.cn: 避税的指控使他的清白形象蒙污。

sentences.en: attempts to improve the image of the police
sentences.cn: 提升警察形象的努力

sentences.en: He had the clearest image in his mind of his mother and father.
sentences.cn: 他脑海中对父母的印象极其清晰。

sentences.en: He’s the spitting image of his mother.
sentences.cn: 他酷似他的母亲。

sentences.en: His image was tarnished by the savings and loan scandal.
sentences.cn: 他的形象因为那桩储蓄信贷丑闻而受损。

sentences.en: His laugh-a-minute image is just a front to hide his deep unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 他滑稽可笑的形象只是用来掩饰内心深处痛苦的假面具。

sentences.en: I saw in him a mirror image of my younger self.
sentences.cn: 我在他身上看见了年轻时的自己。

sentences.en: Johnny has changed his image to fit the times.
sentences.cn: 约翰尼已经改变了他的形象以迎合时代潮流。

sentences.en: Perhaps we did acquire a somewhat fuddy-duddy image in the later years.
sentences.cn: 可能在后来的几年里我们真的让人感到有些古板。

sentences.en: She peered closely at her image in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 她仔细检视镜子中自己的映像。

sentences.en: Slowly, an image began to appear on the screen.
sentences.cn: 屏幕上慢慢地出现了一幅图像。

sentences.en: The image of art theft as a gentleman's crime is outdated.
sentences.cn: 把盗窃艺术品看作是一种绅士犯罪的观念已经过时了。

sentences.en: The outburst was inconsistent with the image he has cultivated.
sentences.cn: 这样大发脾气与他所树立的个人形象不相称。

sentences.en: The tobacco industry has been trying to improve its image.
sentences.cn: 烟草行业一直在试图改善其形象。

sentences.en: Their healthy image disguises the fact that they are highly processed foods.
sentences.cn: 它们看上去有益健康，实则掩盖了其为精加工食品这一事实。

sentences.en: They need to improve their image — they are selling themselves short.
sentences.cn: 他们需要提升自己的形象——他们是在自贬身价。

sentences.en: This image is a myth perpetuated by the media.
sentences.cn: 这种形象是媒体宣传造成的错觉。

sentences.en: This is almost the mirror image of the situation in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 这几乎就是苏格兰局势的翻版。

sentences.en: Underneath this image of normalcy, addiction threatened to rip this family apart.
sentences.cn: 在这一切正常的表象下潜伏的是将使这个家庭四分五裂的毒瘾。

words.tran_cn: 意象派（1912年前后源于英美，主张主题和形式摆脱因袭之风）

phrases.tran_cn: 影像处理系统；图像形成装置
图像分割，图象分割法；局部图象分析法
公众形象；公共形象；群众心目中的形象

trans.tran_cn: 形象，声誉，画像，雕像，塑像，映像，意象
trans.tran_en: a picture of an object in a mirror or in the lens of a camera
